a genuinely solid point and click adventure in an underground world under tyrannical rule by an oppressive theocracy the protagonist is a sheltered orphan raised by the theocracy who rebels when he meets the first feisty woman who crosses his path and its all pretty standard fantasy adventure narrative but it isnt without its charm and good puzzle structure with an ingame hint system to keep you from getting too stuck a decent adventure in the european pointandclick style
